text: Miya poetry is a movement among Muslim poets in Assam. One of its aims is to reclaim the word "Miya", which is often used pejoritively by non-Muslims. The movement started with the publication in 2016 of "Write Down, I am a Miya" by Hafiz Ahmed. There have been complaints by the media and to police that such poetry is anti-Assamese. ==References== Category:Indian poetry Category:Culture of Assam Category:Islamic poetry
